ca.gedge.opgraph
Class InputField

java.lang.Object
  ca.gedge.opgraph.SimpleItem
      ca.gedge.opgraph.InputField
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextualItem, Extendable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Publishable.PublishedInput
public class InputField
extends SimpleItem

A descriptor for an input field of an OpNode in an OpGraph.

Constructor Summary
InputField(String key, String description)
          Constructs a non-optional, fixed input field with a key and description that accepts all types.
InputField(String key, String description, boolean isOptional, boolean isFixed)
          Constructs an input field with a key, description, and optionality.
InputField(String key, String description, boolean isOptional, boolean isFixed, Class<?>... acceptedTypes)
          Constructs an input descriptor that accepts a specified list of classes.
InputField(String key, String description, boolean isOptional, boolean isFixed, TypeValidator... validators)
          Constructs an input descriptor with a specified list of validators.
InputField(String key, String description, Class<?>... acceptedTypes)
          Constructs a non-optional, fixed input field with a key and description that accepts a specified list of classes.
InputField(String key, String description, TypeValidator... validators)
          Constructs a non-optional, fixed input field with a key, description and validator list.

public InputField(String key,
                  String description)
Constructs a non-optional, fixed input field with a key and description that accepts all types.

Parameters:
key - the reference key
description - a description for the field

InputField

public InputField(String key,
                  String description,
                  boolean isOptional,
                  boolean isFixed)
Constructs an input field with a key, description, and optionality. The field that accepts all incoming types.

Parameters:
key - the reference key
description - a description for the field
isOptional - whether or not this field is optional
isFixed - whether or not this field is fixed

InputField

public InputField(String key,
                  String description,
                  Class<?>... acceptedTypes)
Constructs a non-optional, fixed input field with a key and description that accepts a specified list of classes.

Parameters:
key - the reference key
description - a description for the field
acceptedTypes - the classes that are accepted

InputField

                  String description,
                  TypeValidator... validators)
Constructs a non-optional, fixed input field with a key, description and validator list.

Parameters:
key - the reference key
description - a description for the field
validators - a List of TypeValidators to use for validating incoming values

Method Detail

getValidator

public TypeValidator getValidator()
Gets the type validator for this field.

Returns:
the type validator. If null, this field will accept any object.

setValidator

public void setValidator(TypeValidator validator)
Sets the type validator for this field.

Parameters:
validator - the type validator. If null, this field will accept any object.

isFixed

public boolean isFixed()
Gets whether or not this is a fixed field. Fixed fields cannot be removed.

Returns:
true if a fixed field, false otherwise

setFixed

public void setFixed(boolean fixed)
Sets whether or not this is a fixed field. Fixed fields cannot be removed.

Parameters:
fixed - true if a fixed field, false otherwise

isOptional

public boolean isOptional()
Gets whether or not this field is an optional input field.

Returns:
true if this is an optional field, false otherwise

setOptional

public void setOptional(boolean optional)
Sets whether or not this field is optional.

Parameters:
optional - true if an optional field, false otherwise
